title: Admission in pesu
content:
My educational background includes recently completing my mains with a 97.2 percentile. Being from Karnataka and belonging to the EWS category, I might get admission in NIT Surathkal for civil engineering. Is this a good choice, or should I focus on performing well in KCET to get a seat in PESU (computer science) ?  I also want to mention that getting into PESU for CS isn't challenging for me, considering I also qualify for  GMR ( General merit rural) 

Plz help...

comments.body: Hello I'm studying 2nd puc in rnsit blr now and can u giv me some advice on how I can achieve as high as you hav in competitive exams.can you giv me tips on how to study and what to study I would truly appreciate that
Are you serious... Bruh I only scored 97.2 perc, I don't deserve giving suggestions to someone lmao..
Bruv 97 in mains isn't a small thing tho.i think you've worked hard enough to be able to do that
Bruv 97 in mains isn't a small thing tho.i think you've worked hard enough to be able to do that
PESU CSE is far better than civil in NIT. A CS degree is much more valuable than an NIT college tag.
